meanings.sent1: The little puppy was spunkier than expected when facing the big dog.
meanings.sent2: She became spunkier as she stood up to the bully at school.
meanings.sent3: The spunky squirrel bravely faced the challenge of crossing the busy street.
meanings.sent4: Her spunkier attitude in the face of adversity inspired those around her.
meanings.sent5: The spunkier firefighter fearlessly entered the burning building to save the trapped family.

meanings.sent1: The spunkier kids at the party were always the first ones on the dance floor.
meanings.sent2: After a good night's sleep, she woke up feeling spunkier and ready to tackle the day.
meanings.sent3: The spunky cheerleaders cheered with such spunkier energy that the crowd couldn't help but join in.
meanings.sent4: His spunkier personality lit up the room and brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent5: The spunkier team members motivated each other with their infectious enthusiasm.

meanings.definition: Having a lively or spirited attitude
meanings.sent1: The spunkier girl in the group always came up with the most creative ideas.
meanings.sent2: As the music started playing, the crowd grew spunkier and more animated.
meanings.sent3: The spunky cat chased after the laser pointer with a spunkier determination.
meanings.sent4: Her spunkier nature shone through in her vibrant and lively conversations.
meanings.sent5: The spunkier students brought a refreshing energy to the classroom with their lively attitudes.
